headline: Zero Networks Recognized with a Five Star Rating in the 2026 Gartner Peer Insights™ Voice of the Customer for Network Security Microsegmentation
summary: ORLANDO, Fla., January 28, 2026--Zero Networks, the leading provider of zero trust security solutions, today announced that it received a 5 out of 5 overall from customers in the 2026 Gartner Peer Insights™ "Voice of the Customer for Network Security Microsegmentation" based on 25 verified end-user reviews as of January 2026. Zero Networks was the only vendor in the report to receive a 5-star rating.

content.title: Zero Networks Recognized with a Five Star Rating in the 2026 Gartner Peer Insights™ Voice of the Customer for Network Security Microsegmentation

headline: Decisions Recognized in Inaugural Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ and Critical Capabilities for Decision Intelligence Platforms Report
summary: Decisions and ProcessMaker, recently merged providers of leading global business process automation and AI orchestration platforms, today announced Decisions as a Challenger in the 2026 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Decision Intelligence Platforms (DIPs). Decisions was recognized for its "ability to execute," outperforming globally recognized brands.
